title: august 17: full steam ahead!
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the first commercial steamboat in 1807 and what it meant for the Industrial Revolution. After, Maia discusses the activist punk group Pussy Riot and the events that led to three of their members’ imprisonment in 2012. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
